message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm happy to offer it for $15,000.
Alice, your offer is a bit high for me.  I'm interested, but I'm only willing to pay $10,500. Let's see if we can work something out.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is quite valuable, and $10,500 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
Alice,  $13,000 is still too high for me. I'm really keen on this product, but I can't go higher than $11,500. Let's try to find a compromise.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  Let's make this happen.  If you're willing to come up to $12,500, I'm willing to close the deal right now.
Alice, I understand your position, but $12,500 is still outside my budget.  I'm willing to go up to $11,800.  Let's see if we can meet in the middle.
